label: Modbus Simple Servers
info:
simple flows to show what you 
can do with the package

think about organization of reads and 
writes and try to simplify these flows

name: Information
info:
The Modbus Server and Modbus Flex Server 
working with all reading and writing nodes.

These are two different servers 
from different libraries.

The simple examples hold 
the same functions for both servers.

name: Modbus Server
info: These nodes are to write to the Modbus Server.

name: reset on High
reset on HighHigh
Modbus Server
info: These nodes are to write to the Modbus Server.

name: Server for Modbus Flex Suite Flow
Modbus Flex Server
info:
These nodes are to write to the Modbus Flex Server.
This is a seperate package for Node-RED see:
node-red-contrib-modbus-flex-server

name: reset on High
reset on HighHigh
Modbus Flex Server
info: These nodes are to write to the Modbus Flex Server.
